languages.text: "Чувства к элантах мешают тебе править корабль сквозь Ша'эиль. Соберись, трехокая! Твоя слабость может стоить нам жизней... и не только их".
"Your feelings for the elantach are hindering you from guiding the ship through Sha'eil. Pull yourself together, three-eyed one! Your weakness could cost us our lives... and even more than that."
languages.original_text: "Чувства к элантах мешают тебе править корабль сквозь Ша'эиль. Соберись, трехокая! Твоя слабость может стоить нам жизней... и не только их".

traits.locale_text: "Your feelings for the elantach are hindering you from guiding the ship through Sha'eil. Pull yourself together, three-eyed one! Your weakness could cost us our lives... and even more than that."
"Your feelings for the elantach are hindering you from guiding the ship through Sha'eil. Pull yourself together, three-eyed one! Your weakness could cost us our lives... and even more than that."
"Your feelings for the elantach are hindering you from guiding the ship through Sha'eil. Pull yourself together, three-eyed one! Your weakness could cost us our lives... and even more than that."
"Your feelings for the elantach are hindering you from guiding the ship through Sha'eil. Pull yourself together, three-eyed one! Your weakness could cost us our lives... and even more than that."

languages.text: “你对外界人的情感正在干扰你，让你无法顺利带领飞船穿过纱芮尔。振作起来，三眼之人！你的动摇会害我们丧命……甚至付出更大的代价。”
languages.original_text: "Your feelings for the elantach are hindering you from guiding the ship through Sha'eil. Pull yourself together, three-eyed one! Your weakness could cost us our lives... and even more than that."

traits.locale_text: “你对外界人的情感正在干扰你，让你无法顺利带领飞船穿过纱芮尔。振作起来，三眼之人！你的动摇会害我们丧命……甚至付出更大的代价。”

languages.text: « Vos sentiments pour l'elantach vous empêchent de guider le vaisseau à travers le Sha'eil. Ressaisissez-vous, vous qui êtes dotée du troisième œil ! Vos manquements pourraient nous coûter la vie... ou pire encore. »
languages.original_text: "Your feelings for the elantach are hindering you from guiding the ship through Sha'eil. Pull yourself together, three-eyed one! Your weakness could cost us our lives... and even more than that."

traits.locale_text: « Vos sentiments pour l'elantach vous empêchent de guider le vaisseau à travers le Sha'eil. Ressaisissez-vous, vous qui êtes dotée du troisième œil ! Vos manquements pourraient nous coûter la vie... ou pire encore. »

languages.text: «Tus sentimientos por {mf|el|la} elantach te están impidiendo guiar la nave por el Sha'eil. ¡Concéntrate, mujer de tres ojos! Tu debilidad puede costarnos la vida... o más que eso».
languages.original_text: "Your feelings for the elantach are hindering you from guiding the ship through Sha'eil. Pull yourself together, three-eyed one! Your weakness could cost us our lives... and even more than that."

traits.locale_text: «Tus sentimientos por {mf|el|la} elantach te están impidiendo guiar la nave por el Sha'eil. ¡Concéntrate, mujer de tres ojos! Tu debilidad puede costarnos la vida... o más que eso».

languages.text: 「エランタへの思いが、シャーエイルを通過する船の誘導を妨げている。しっかりして、三つ目の人！あなたの弱さは、私たちの命を奪うかもしれない…いや、それ以上かもしれない。」
languages.original_text: "Your feelings for the elantach are hindering you from guiding the ship through Sha'eil. Pull yourself together, three-eyed one! Your weakness could cost us our lives... and even more than that."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタへの思いが、シャーエイルを通過する船の誘導を妨げている。しっかりして、三つ目の人！あなたの弱さは、私たちの命を奪うかもしれない…いや、それ以上かもしれない。」

languages.text: "Eure Gefühle für den Elantach hindern Euch daran, das Schiff durch Sha'eil zu führen. Reißt Euch zusammen, Dreiauge! Eure Schwäche könnte uns das Leben kosten ... und noch mehr."
languages.original_text: "Your feelings for the elantach are hindering you from guiding the ship through Sha'eil. Pull yourself together, three-eyed one! Your weakness could cost us our lives... and even more than that."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Gefühle für den Elantach hindern Euch daran, das Schiff durch Sha'eil zu führen. Reißt Euch zusammen, Dreiauge! Eure Schwäche könnte uns das Leben kosten ... und noch mehr."

languages.original_text: "Your feelings for the elantach are hindering you from guiding the ship through Sha'eil. Pull yourself together, three-eyed one! Your weakness could cost us our lives... and even more than that."

languages.text: "Elantach'a olan duyguların, geminin seyrini aksatıyor Sha'eil. Kendine gel artık üç gözlü! Zayıflığın, hepimizin canına... Hatta daha kötüsüne mal olacak."
languages.original_text: "Your feelings for the elantach are hindering you from guiding the ship through Sha'eil. Pull yourself together, three-eyed one! Your weakness could cost us our lives... and even more than that."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach'a olan duyguların, geminin seyrini aksatıyor Sha'eil. Kendine gel artık üç gözlü! Zayıflığın, hepimizin canına... Hatta daha kötüsüne mal olacak."
